Guise of Servant of the First Crafter
Guise of the Witch-king of Angmar

After using Double-edged Strike, make a pair of powerful attacks against your enemies.
<rgb=#FFFF00> Dual-wielding required.</rgb>
After using Double-edged Strike, strike at your opponent's throat.

Shakes the earth as if an Ent stamped his foot, greatly damaging several enemies.
If your target has recently been shaken by Cracked Earth, this skill deals bonus damage.

Summons an eagle companion.
The eagle is a noble creature which can deal damage and, if called upon, will sacrifice itself to save you.
Your companion makes a wild and damaging attack.
Your companion capitalizes on an enemy wounded by Burning Embers, fanning the flames and causing them to burn hotter.
A shot that strikes the enemy with fear.
Quickly heals a great deal of Morale and grants a short movement buff when out of combat.
Rains thorn arrows down upon your enemies, allowing you to pin multiple targets.
Revives a defeated ally in combat, with their Health and Power mostly intact.

Increases Hope and Incoming Healing in a 5m area for 2m 30s.
Furthermore, if an ally remains within the area for a few seconds, they will receive a buff to Resistance and Avoidance Penetration when they exit the area.
Call upon a powerful song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light that will slow the creatures who are hit by it.
Spend a considerable amount of your power to shield an ally for a time.

Increases the damage you and your companions deal to the foe.
<rgb=#FF7700>This effect does not stack with other potent Incoming Damage effects.</rgb>
Your very presence inspires those around you to perform better in combat.

Makes three deadly attacks.
This attack can only be evaded; it will never miss, be parried by or blocked by an on level opponent.

Makes three deadly attacks.
This attack can only be evaded; it will never miss, be parried by or blocked by an on level opponent.
Heals the Champion for a percentage of their health over time.

Makes a full AoE attack, inflicting heavy damage.
This attack never misses on level opponents.

Makes a full AoE attack, inflicting heavy damage.
This attack never misses on level opponents.

Briefly increases damage, Power regen, and attack speed.
Adds 1 Fervour Pip every 5 seconds.

A powerful attack against a foe providing a chance to knock targets down.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Thrust or Overwhelm.</rgb>

Strike a hard blow with your shield.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Bash.</rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>
This stance focuses on enraging your enemies.
You know how to goad your enemies into attacking you, making you their most threatening opponent, as well as raising your Guardian's Ward.
Your Herald has a chance to stun the target with a melee attack. Additionally, your Herald will do 50% more damage if they are behind the target.
Your Herald will taunt the target with a melee attack.
You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Victory into battle. This banner reduces power costs of those around it.

Boosts Morale of nearby Fellows.
This skill is more potent when used with a Defeat Event.

Deals Light damage to nearby foes.
This skill is more potent when used with a Defeat Event.
An attack that triggers a Battle-readied State, enabling you to deal more damage.
You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of War into battle. This banner increases the damage dealt by those around it.
Removes Poison, Disease, Wound or Fear effects from nearby allies.
You enlist a Herald to carry your Banner of Hope into battle. This banner increases the mitigations of those around it.

A very damaging melee attack with increased critical damage.
Requires Battle-readied State.
Using this skill enables the Battle-hardened state, boosting healing and defences.
Critical attacks deal greater damage and trigger a Defeat Response.
A shout that draws threat, forcing the enemy to attack you.
Your Fervour is instantly increased as well as some additional fervour over time.
Costs 30% of your current power but greatly restores your morale.

Attack with both weapon and shield.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a block response.</rgb>
A strike with your shield that will open a block response.

You are able to catch your breath to restore morale and power.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a block or parry response.</rgb>
A quick swipe that will strike multiple enemies.
Draws enemy threat away from your allies.
Your proximity to your fellowship and skill with a weapon increases the martial prowess of all those near you.
Regenerates Power, increasing with every enemy near you. (This skill works in combat only.)

Places a trap to root the enemy.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.
In a desperate time, instantly reach full Focus.
Strike hard with your staff. If your pet is flanking the enemy, you will deal bonus damage.

Strike hard with your staff, summoning a lightning strike.
<rgb=#ff0091>With Improved Ignition, this skill can cash-out Burning Embers for bonus damage.</rgb>
Lightning wreaths your enemy while restoring your own power.
Transfers Morale to an ally or companion.
Cleanse multiple wounds, diseases, poisons, or fears from an ally.

This sign asks your animal friend to go into a rage, attacking faster and making itself look as threatening as possible. You cannot have more than one Sign of the Wild active on your companion at a time without the trait 'Master of Beasts'.
Unstable earth deals Fire damage to several enemies.

Heals Morale in a time of need.
Briefly protects you, while damaging enemies who attack you.
A flash instantly dazes the enemy, but damage will break its stupor.
Transfers Power to an ally or companion.

Anthem: Increases Ranged and Tactical Damage of all nearby fellowship or raid members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 2 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>
Call upon a song to blast your enemies with an area-of-effect of light. This attack will also remove a Corruption buff from the enemies you hit.
Bring relief to your fellowship. Applies a short, potent Heal to your fellows and deflects some Incoming Damage back at their attackers.

Inspires Fellows to perform heroic feats, and the effects last longer and recover more quickly.
Burglar: Gains a Critical Response.
Captain: Gains an Enemy Defeat Response.
Champion: Gains an Enemy Defeat Response.
Guardian: Gains a Block Response and a Parry Response.
Hunter: Gains a Parry Response.
Lore-master: Beacon of Hope has a decreased Cooldown and Morale cost.
Minstrel: Unlocks Bolster Courage for free and Dissonance Calls.
Rune-keeper: Scribe's Spark and Prelude to Hope have decreased Cooldowns.
Warden: Shield Piercer has a decreased Cooldown.

Boosts Tactical damage and harms your foe.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas.
This skill provides you with three power ballad bonus effects allowing access to Anthems and Codas. It also breaks any silence effects on you.
A quick, sharp attack against your foe.

Daze the enemy briefly, waking the foe when damage is dealt.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.

Careful aim results in a Critical Hit and reduced miss chance on the next damaging attack.
Using this skill will not break Stealth.
This skill guarantees a Critical Response
Blind enemies in front of you, dazing them momentarily and leaving their movements hampered.

Divert the enemy's attention briefly from yourself while in Stealth.
Does not break Stealth.

Strike to slow the foe's attacks.
Limit: One Trick per target.
Strike to lower the enemy's defences.

Disappear from before the enemy's eyes.
Briefly improves Stealth. Using this skill will not break Stealth.

Move about unseen while Sneaking.
There is a chance enemies will detect you, especially when you move in front of them.

Cause the enemy to take more damage and prevent them from using most ranged attacks.
Limit: One Trick per target.
Your companion has a hive of bees living on their hide. These bees are willing to defend their home.
When active, nearby ore deposits are displayed on the radar.
When active, nearby tree branches are displayed on the radar.
When active, nearby crops are displayed on the radar.
You auto-attack when wielding a one-handed weapon with a shield.
You auto-attack when dual-wielding one-handed weapons.
You auto-attack when wielding a two-handed weapon.
You auto-attack when wielding a bow.
You auto-attack when wielding a crossbow.
This fellowship skill does minor direct melee damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.
This fellowship skill does minor direct ranged damage to your target, then more damage over time and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.
This fellowship skill replenishes your power and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.
This fellowship skill does direct melee damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.
This fellowship skill does direct ranged damage to your target and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.
This fellowship skill replenishes your morale and can contribute to fellowship manoeuvres.
You are hardier than most and can recover from most crowd control effects.
With a flash of steel you render your target unable to use their weapons for a short while. This skill can only be used against players.
You cut the legs of your foe, slowing their movement.

You spray your target with clinging, sticky webs, reducing their chance to hit you.<rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>
When not in combat, you can hide beneath the ground, unseen by foes, until you burst from the ground.
You carefully place a snare on the ground to trap your foes.
You release several arrows in quick succession hitting multiple foes around your target.
A fire tipped arrow which will continue to burn the target after landing.
You can shout at an ally who is dazed, stunned, rooted, or knocked down and they will begin to recover.
You compel your allies to greatly hasten their movement for a brief time.
Exhort and deride your allies, restoring some of their health. Heals all allies within radius.

When you defeat an enemy, you can howl to heal yourself and your fellows over time.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires a Defeat Response</rgb>

From beneath the very nose of your foe, you can disappear and prowl unseen once more. For a short while your stealth is extremely effective.<rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer, Disappear becomes Topple. Topple: Knocks your target to the ground. </rgb>

You can prowl beneath the notice of all but the keenest eyes, waiting to strike.
<rgb=#FF7700>In Flayer: Brute Increases the application chance of your brute bonuses.</rgb>
A powerful melee attack, followed by a quick off-hand swipe.
Make a frontal AoE attack and reduce your enemies' Physical Mitigation.
Make a frontal AoE attack and reduce your enemies' Physical Mitigation.
Makes a pair of savage attacks, followed by a quick off-hand swipe.
Makes three deadly attacks that are difficult to parry or evade.
Makes three deadly attacks that are difficult to parry or evade.
You reflect damage to your attacker when hit.
You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount.
You make an attack which allows you to brace yourself against counterattack, increasing your Morale by a small amount.

Gain a protective morale shield defending you against incoming damage.
Bubble strength is 35% of the targets' Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.
Your taunting cry forces your target to face and attack you for a few seconds.
A powerful attack that can only be used on opponents under 20% health.
You make a cunning attack that catches your opponents off-guard. Your area-of-effect attacks will deal more damage for a short time.

Increases movement speed.
Grants immunity to movement speed debuffs.
Makes a swift melee attack, interrupting any induction skills being attempted by the enemy.

Makes a full AoE attack, which stuns your opponents.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Stun replaced with a mount speed debuff</rgb>
Makes an attack which snares your opponent.
You make a melee attack, securing your weapons and altering your fighting position to make greater use of your armour and attempting to secure yourself from wounds.
You attack with your ranged weapon.
Tales of your heroic acts draw cheers from the crowd.

Mark an enemy so that allies can do increased damage to it.
You may only mark one target at a time.
Increases the movement speed of the Fellowship.

Mark an enemy, causing their strikes to empower you or your allies.
You may only mark one target at a time.

An AoE double-strike inflicting moderate damage.
Requires Battle-readied State.
Using this skill enables the Battle-hardened state, boosting healing and defences.
Critical hits trigger a Defeat Response.
Restores an ally's morale over time.
You are able to resist succumbing to defeat for a short time.

Mark an enemy so that allies can gain health when they attack it.
You may only mark one target at a time.
Revives up to two defeated allies and inspires nearby Fellows to greatness.
You put yourself in harm's way to defend your nearby companions, taking half of all damage dealt to them upon yourself.
Your presence commands respect from those around you.
A damaging melee attack that increases the potency of incoming healing.
Quickly heals Morale of an ally or yourself.

Heals a small area around your target while boosting your healing capability.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas while in combat.
<rgb=#00ffDD>While in Dissonance and Melody this skill will deal damage to a target instead of healing.</rgb>
Your shout does light damage to your enemies and can interrupt their actions.
Your shout does light damage to your enemies and can interrupt their actions.

Heals you and harms your foe.
Ballads unlock Anthems and Codas.

Anthem: Increases Melee Damage Attack Speed, and Orc-craft and Fell-wrought Mitigation of all nearby fellowship or raid members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 2 ballad buffs present on the Minstrel.</rgb>

Anthem: Increases Resistances, Tactical Mitigation, and Shadow, Acid, and Fire Mitigation of all nearby fellowship or raid members.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires 1 ballad buff present on the Minstrel.</rgb>

Heals the Morale of the Fellowship.
This skill is not usable in Dissonance.

Calling upon the Valar can send certain evil foes fleeing in terror for a short time.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Mounted Combat Enemies: Fear replaced with attack speed debuff.</rgb>
Significantly heals Morale of an ally or yourself.
A song that makes an ally's heart glad again, removing some of the evil that currently plagues it.

Removes one Poison, Fear, Disease, or Wound from nearby fellows.
Protects against further Fears.
In desperate times, instantly heals the Morale of the Fellowship.
A song that can make your enemy become drowsy and not detect players until they are much closer than normal. This does not work against monsters already engaged in combat.
You are talented at feigning death, causing enemies to ignore you completely.

A story so potent that it provides you with a shield of morale that must be destroyed before you will begin losing morale again. The name comes from the adage that those who know this story were said to have been able to take a blow from Helm Hammerhand himself.
Bubble strength is 35% of your Max Morale pool before other bonuses apply.

Summons a raven companion.
The raven specializes in buffing and debuffing.
Your companion uses their wings to partially obscure you and shield you from harm.
Your companion hampers archers, inhibiting their ability to fire and enraging them.
Your companion takes evasive action to avoid harm.

Use Power to heal Morale for both yourself and your companion.
Must have a companion summoned.

Tearing winds cause frost damage in a small radius.
<rgb=#ff0091>When traited in Nature's Fury, this skill has a chance to spread Burning Embers to nearby foes.</rgb>

Summons a bear companion.
Bears are tough companions which can draw the ire of the enemy.

Summons a bear companion.
Bears are tough companions which can draw the ire of the enemy.
Your companion lets out a terrifying bellow and forces many enemies to target them.
Your companion weakens their target's offence.
Your companion makes a wild and damaging attack.

Damages and stuns the target.
This skill has a large bonus to its Critical chance and magnitude.
Slows enemy attack speed and reduces Parry chance.
Renders an ally immune to stuns, dazes, and other combat states.
Allows you to better see hidden enemies.
Your knowledge of the elements is able to weaken and dismay your foe, reducing their Outgoing Damage.
Rapidly-growing roots hold several enemies in place.

You call upon the wisdom of the Valar, recovering some of your skills and providing a temporary immunity to induction set back from damage.
<rgb=#33BCFF>Keeper of Animals:</rgb> Retribution, Catmint, Unbreakable Bond
<rgb=#FF0000>Master of Nature's Fury:</rgb> Sticky Gourd, Lightning Storm, Ents go to War
<rgb=#ecdd11>Ancient Master:</rgb> Storm Lore, Test of Will, Air Lore
A sweeping back-and forth strike in a frontal arc.
This stance focuses your defences on blocking attacks.

A retaliation after parrying an attack.

Whirl to attack enemies in a circle.

Deal a thrusting blow to open a Deep Wound.

Laugh at your enemies after bashing them with your Shield-swipe, taunting them. This skill draws the enemy's attention to yourself.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Requires the use of Shield-swipe.</rgb>
When dazed, stunned, or knocked down: recover from impairing effects and inflict them upon your enemy instead.
Makes a whistle to give to a friend, for summoning you to their side.

Although untrained, you have the natural ability to move about unseen, though there is a chance enemies may detect you, especially when moving in front of them.

With the speed and grace of the Eldar, you can put up a strong parry defence.
You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Power.
Allows you to smash an enemy with your head for damage.
This enables you to quickly return to Thorin's Gate. This skill is easily interrupted.
For a short amount of time, you can withstand blows that would batter a weaker race's Morale into dust.
You provide a bonus to your Fellowship's Vitality.
Two fast attacks on your target.
A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of you.
A destructive attack, weakening the target's armour.
When your target has less than 50% of their morale, you can make an extremely damaging attack with an increased chance to critical.
You throw dust into the air around, blinding nearby foes.

The sight of your opponents falling before you catapults you into an empowering rage, giving you bursts of healing and increasing damage dealt and taken.
<rgb=#00FFDD>This skill will become stronger with a Defeat Response.</rgb>
You pull on your bow and loose an arrow.
You loose several arrows, carved and crafted to howl as they fly through the air.

A sharpened arrow that can pierce armour.
<rgb=#00ff00>Ignores 30% of your target's mitigations</rgb>
A shaft aimed to slow the movement of your quarry.
A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of you.
You can better evade the attacks of your foes for a short period of time.
Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.
A ferocious and terrifying battle roar to weaken the certainty and morale of your foe.
Swing your weapon in a wide arc with a joyous blood-lust that inspires you and your lessers to keep fighting.
Your blistering derision shames your target to higher health.
You bellow a harsh command, enabling up to three defeated allies to rise, albeit at very low health.
You single out an ally to support and protect them in the midst of battle.
When the fight has begun, your commanding aura allows your allies to fight more viciously.
Auto-attack when wielding a one-handed weapon with a shield.

An attack with your sharp talons deals damage and causes the target to bleed.
<rgb=#00ff00>Ignores 50% of your target's mitigations.</rgb>
A ranged attack which flings a painful contact poison at the target causing damage over time.
A bite injecting a poison which weakens the target and can stun them if not cured.

A ranged attack that targets the victim's legs with sticky webs, rooting them in place.<rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times.</rgb>

You can cover your target's arms with sticky webbing, slowing their attacks.<rgb=#00ff00>
Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>
You can spit a crippling poison in a spray, hitting enemies in front of you up to a short distance away.
You can burrow into the ground becoming invulnerable and hidden for a limited time.

You attack with your sharp and piercing claws. <rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Raking Claws Adds a bleed effect. Brute bonus: Interupts targets inductions
In Shadow: Bestial Claw Deals more damage than Claws and has a much greater chance to critically hit. </rgb>
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

You leap at your target to distract it, interrupting actions it was performing.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

Unseen till the last moment, you leap at your target and knock it down to the ground.
<rgb=#00FFDD>Increased damage when attacking from behind</rgb>

You rip at your target's flesh, tearing muscle and slowing his attacks. If the target was suffering from your crippling bite he begins taking damage over time. <rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Brutal Fangs Reduces Evade rating. Brute bonus: Reduces armour rating.
In Shadow: Shadow Fangs Increases induction time and reduces parry rating. </rgb>
A sharp snap of your jaws and your target's movement is slowed.

You sink your teeth in and rip, and your target is silenced.
<rgb=#FF7700> In Flayer:Muscle Tear Decreases target movement speed and increases attack duration. </rgb>
A sudden burst of speed for catching prey, or to avoid becoming it.
Auto-attack when not wielding a weapon in the primary hand.
Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.

Provides a Heal-over-time to the Fellowship and removes Fear effects.
Allies in range will become immune to Fear effect for 10s.
Protects an ally by intercepting all incoming damage.
An attack that makes up for a lack of elegance with brutal effectiveness.
A sweeping cut that can damage multiple targets in front of the attacker.
Auto-attack when wielding a two-handed weapon.
A basic, but effective cutting attack.
Two quick attacks on your target.
Increases the chance that you will critical on Relentless and Remorseless Strikes.
Auto-attack when attacking with single unarmed attacks.
Reduces threat generated by the Champion.
Large increase to armour for a short time.
A melee attack that heals the Morale of your Shield-brother.
Auto-attack when wielding only a single one-handed weapon.
A scattered people, the Rangers of the North are skilled at becoming unseen when they wish it.
Although not capable of being invisible in the spirit world, Rangers are still known for disappearing from sight. For a short while your stealth is extremely effective.
A Ranger is both master of blade and bow. This attack will knock down the opponent.
Strength of morale can be called from the line of Elros even still in this dark time. This will restore morale to the Ranger.
When marked as a prey of one of the DÃºnedain, their wrath is terrible.
A potent ranged attack that causes devastating damage on critical hit. It will never miss against on-level creatures.

Returns you and your Fellowship to West Angmar.

Returns you and your Fellowship to East Angmar.
This skill is easily interrupted.

Binds you to one of many camp-sites scattered across the world.

Returns you and your Fellowship to Ost Guruth in the Lone-lands.
This skill is easily interrupted.

Returns you and your Fellowship to Michel Delving in the Shire.
This skill is easily interrupted.

Returns you and your Fellowship to Evendim.
This skill is easily interrupted.
This well-thrown knife will root an in-bound target.
These arrows will make the servant of the Eye burn.
A shot that cannot be missed, parried, evaded, or blocked.
Steady yourself and shut out the world around you, reducing Incoming Damage while restoring Morale, Power, and Focus.
Crush little annoying things. Sometimes, stun them. Sometimes, make them hurt long time.
Swat the whiny little things so they fly away. Sometimes, they run slow after.
Throw rock at far away things. Hurt things near far thing. Sometimes, make things bleed after.
Quick-ish stone from the ground attack
Hit small things twice. Sometimes, make things hit back slow.
Bring foot up, put foot down, puny things fall over. Sometimes, things get hurt easier after.
Pick up rock. Drop rock. Sometimes, hurt little things extra lots.
Get angry. Hit harder. Hit faster.
Roar of rage. When is sometimes? Sometimes is next.

Places a snare to slow the enemy and cause damage over time.
Trap remains for 60 seconds after being placed.
Briefly increases the defence of your Shield-brother.
A melee attack that interrupts enemy inductions.
Breaks the effects of Dazes, Stuns and Knockdowns.

You gain a surge of energy for a short time.
Puts you in a Battle-readied State.
Increases your damage output for a short time.

An attack that does Light damage with an increased Critical chance.
Requires Battle-hardened State.
Fellows within range gain the Light of Elendil, enabling them to deal additional Light damage.
This attack never misses and cannot be blocked, parried or evaded.
When active, nearby artifacts are displayed on the radar.
A burst of speed can make the difference between freedom and flattened.
Sometimes survival comes down to not being hit. Actually, most times.
Nothing can escape your searching gaze. So long as it is a worm.
You peck at something with your beak.
Middle-earth is a dangerous place. Sometimes it is good to be dead.

You're not sure what, but something isn't right.
A flare in the sky dazes enemies, but damage will break their stupor.

Creates a circle in which enemies are vulnerable to tactical damage and more likely to miss.

Deals AoE Light damage and reduces Light damage resistance.

You call out to your fellows, inspiring them to Greatness and resetting the cooldown of key skills. This is a raid-wide effect.
Beorning: Thickened Hide, Call to Wild, and Nature's Bond

Grants a Morale bubble to a Fellowship member.

This melody inspires you or your target to better know the fluid nature of battle, providing them swift blades and manoeuvres that dishearten their foes. When traited in The Protector of Song, it will also occasionally increase threat generation.

Your charismatic speech drives fear into the hearts of your enemies.

Smash a phial of sticky tar onto the ground.
Slows movement speed of enemies who run through tar, and makes them vulnerable to attack. This vulnerability will continue for a time after an enemy has left the tar or the tar has dissipated.
A thunder-clap stuns surrounding enemies briefly, inflicting weak damage.

This powerful chant recalls great deeds done in battle by the mighty Valar when the world was young, demoralizing your foes.

Vicious lightning strikes at the enemy.

As an Uruk you are adept at whipping those lesser beasts in Sauron's army back into shape.
Heals your target and anyone in their war-band in close proximity to your target.

Wargs are pack hunters. You can target a foe and increase the damage dealt by all members of your war party, while reducing their incoming healing.<rgb=#FF7700>
In Flayer: Pack Flayer Roots target in place, causing them to be unable to block, parry, or evade attacks.
In Shadow: Shadow Pack Lowers the defence and incoming healing of all enemies around the Warg.</rgb>
So great is the fear your howl can cause that you shatter the resolve of the mightiest of foes. Does not break stealth.
Rage seething beneath the surface of your flesh takes on a physical manifestation and any daring to attack you will feel the wrath of the Orcs!

When death nears, you gain the ability to call on the power of your blood and become a powerful force of destruction before your flame is extinguished. Most offensive skills are reset when this skill is activated.
You become immune to death while the effect is active, but will lose half of your morale when it ends.
Your heritage extends to the fabric of shadow and you harness a piece of that black energy to grow stronger with each blow from an enemy.

Your ancestry affords you incredible powers of recovery. After successfully defeating an opponent, you can immediately drain them of vitality and restore your health. This burst of vitality fills your Venom and briefly increases your toxicity.

Your presence inspires your allies with greater strength; mostly through fear.
Your teeth bite deeply into your foe, tearing a tendon and opening a chance for a warband manoeuvre.

A swift swipe meant for the eyes. Breaks your opponent's concentration.

When the time comes to enter the fray it falls to the Orcs to break battle lines. Your speed increases for a brief period of time. You gain a short immunity to incoming root, stun and daze effects. This skill can only be used while out of combat.
When your target begins preparing an attack, you give them a swift punch to the gut to interrupt their preparation.
Your knowledge of the enemy is so great that you can target vital organs with great efficacy.
Your sight is so keen that you can keep a close eye on an enemy and never lose sight of them.
Seeing a ranged opponent preparing an assault, you take careful aim and disrupt their attempts.
You place a terrible banner bearing the Eye of Sauron to weaken your opponents' will to fight.

Applies Ensnared Effect. Stacks 3 times. </rgb>

Living slime coats the target's wounds and restores health.

Release hallucinogenic spores that strike fear into nearby enemies.

Written words can have a chilling effect on their victim. Slows your foe, but damaging them will return their speed.

You focus all of your ranged fire on a single opponent. You cannot move or perform any other actions while in this state. Barraging attacks cannot critical and they cannot miss, be blocked, evaded, or parried.

You firmly plant your feet and take aim.

PBAoE Taunt

Recover from being dazed, stunned, or knocked down.

Brawlers have been known to inspire foolhardy acts of bravery in their comrades - mostly by charging headlessly into a fray and dragging their allies along with them against their better judgement.
Move Speed Buff
